hero.title: Transform the way students learn math with Blueberry Math!
hero.subtitle: Dive into a unique educational experience with our space adventure: exciting challenges for your students and a complete transformation in how they learn math.

about.title: What is Blueberry Math?
description: Blueberry Math is an innovative educational platform that transforms how students learn mathematics through an engaging space adventure theme.
Our platform combines cutting-edge technology with proven educational methods to create a unique learning experience that makes mathematics both fun and effective for students.
Through interactive challenges, personalized learning paths, and real-time feedback, students develop strong mathematical foundations while enjoying their educational journey.
We believe that every student has the potential to excel in mathematics, and our platform provides the tools and support needed to unlock that potential.

features.title: How Blueberry Math enhances the learning experience

unlimitedResources.title: Unlimited Resources
unlimitedResources.description: With Blueberry Math, you'll have access to infinite activities designed with a variety of dynamic and engaging templates to keep your students motivated.

realLifeMath.title: Real-Life Math
realLifeMath.description: Blueberry Math prepares students to solve practical problems linked to familiar and recognizable contexts, fostering meaningful and relevant learning.

individualizedProgress.title: Individualized Progress
individualizedProgress.description: Each student progresses at their own pace and level, with access to additional activities they can work on independently, accommodating classroom diversity.

tracking.title: Tracking and Evaluation
tracking.description: Access detailed analytics of individual and group progress. Download qualitative reports to share with families or streamline assessments.

pedagogicalSuggestions.title: Pedagogical Suggestions
pedagogicalSuggestions.description: Receive personalized recommendations to help you identify specific needs of each student so you can effectively guide them to overcome challenges and progress.

learningFromMistakes.title: Learning from Mistakes
learningFromMistakes.description: We believe mistakes are always opportunities to learn. Each activity provides instant and detailed feedback or step-by-step solutions to help students understand their errors and move forward.

teacherSupport.title: Support for Teachers
teacherSupport.description: We understand that classroom diversity can be challenging for teachers, as meeting each student's specific needs isn't always easy. At Blueberry Math, our goal is to save you valuable time so you can focus on what you do best: teaching.

curriculum.title: Curriculum Planning and Organization
curriculum.description: We adapt content to your schedule and textbooks, ensuring students practice exactly what you need to reinforce.

experience.description: After your class, students can practice cooperatively or work independently.

monitoring.title: Monitoring and Qualitative Assessment
monitoring.description: Get comprehensive insights into the progress of the entire class and each student. Download qualitative reports to share with parents or assess students more effectively.

testimonials.sarah: Blueberry Math has transformed how my child learns mathematics. The engaging activities and instant feedback make learning fun and effective.

activities.title: Our Activities
activities.pageDescription: Explore our interactive math activities designed for engaging learning.
activities.categoriesDescription: We explore mathematical concepts through various activities organized into the following categories:
activities.selectContent: Select a content to see an example of the activities

simplifyingComplexity.title: Simplifying Complexity
simplifyingComplexity.description: We've broken down learning objectives into small, well-defined components connected to each other. Our algorithm uses this structure to guide students through personalized learning, ensuring they progress in the correct order with a gradual approach.

personalizedMap.title: Your Personalized Map
personalizedMap.description: We structure the knowledge components based on your curriculum so students will find the same unit and lesson names on Blueberry Math as in their school materials.

infinitePossibilities.title: Infinite Possibilities
infinitePossibilities.description: Every learning goal has its own evaluation engine capable of generating a limitless variety of activities. These activities are designed by an interdisciplinary team of educators, pedagogues, mathematicians, grammar experts, and designers. Activity values update automatically, giving each student a personalized experience every time. With a base of 8,000 activities, the possibilities are endless: each student faces different challenges every time they log in.

holisticLearning.title: Holistic Learning
holisticLearning.description: Our methodology ensures comprehensive learning through a structured approach. Identify - Students learn to recognize and understand key mathematical concepts in various contexts. Recall - Students practice retrieving and applying previously learned concepts to reinforce understanding. Apply - Students demonstrate mastery by using mathematical knowledge to solve real-world problems effectively.

meta.title: About Us - Blueberry Math
meta.description: Learn about Blueberry Math's mission and team.

content.poweredBy: Blueberry Math is a product powered by
content.oneclickDescription: Oneclick is a team of digital technologists, product experts, and education enthusiasts united by a common goal: to make the world a better place through education by helping millions of students become fulfilled adults.
content.innovation: Innovation has been the foundation of our ethos since our inception. We continuously research and experiment with new ways to transform great content into successful learning experiences, integrating neuroscientific evidence with advanced computational technologies.
content.expertise: With recognized expertise in the K–12 publishing sector, we design and build versatile solutions to meet the needs of students, teachers, and schools. Over the past 15+ years, we've supported educational publishers in their digital transformations, but we believe education still has much room for innovation, and we're committed to doing more.
content.passion: We're passionate about technology and education, and we know technology can revolutionize the learning process.
content.learning: We've learned so much from publishers, and we continue learning daily by engaging with teachers, students, and schools to understand their needs, frustrations, and aspirations for better learning experiences.
content.birth: That's how Blueberry Math was born—a combination of our passions for education and technology, aimed at empowering the teaching and learning experience in one of the most critical subjects. And hopefully, helping you, the teachers, to guide students in becoming the individuals they aspire to be.

dailyRoutine.title: Integrate Blueberry into Daily Routines
dailyRoutine.description: Blueberry Math is a versatile tool that can be used at home or in school. In the classroom, dedicate a few minutes at the beginning or end of the class to reinforce what you've taught, or use it as a reward activity after completing other tasks.

consistency.title: Consistency is Key
consistency.description: Establish a daily routine, whether at home, in the classroom, or both, for students to practice math for 15 minutes a day, consolidating their key skills.

motivation.title: Motivate Through Game Narrative
motivation.description: Teachers guide students through topics that will be covered in the following week. Encourage them to complete missions as part of their learning and engage with the storyline.

dashboard.title: Use the Teacher Dashboard as Your Ally
dashboard.description: Review your students' progress at least once a week, identify those needing additional support, and plan personalized interventions based on the platform's data. Use progress and dedication reports to group students for peer-learning opportunities.

families.title: Involve Families in Learning
families.description: Share progress reports with parents at the end of each term to keep them informed and involved in their child's mathematical development.

evaluation.title: Fun Knowledge Evaluation
evaluation.description: Use in-class weekly practice sessions to review topics and conduct diagnostic assessments in a dynamic and collaborative way, tailored to your class's levels.

adaptive.title: Adaptive Progression
adaptive.description: Activities adjust to the student's level, keeping them challenged but not frustrated, ensuring they work through the curriculum at their own pace.

forgetting.title: Forgetting Curve
forgetting.description: Students review previously learned concepts to avoid forgetting and build strong knowledge.

contexts.title: Real-Life Contexts
contexts.description: Make learning more enjoyable and applicable by using scenarios students can relate to.

practice.title: Spaced Practice
practice.description: Algorithms ensure students revisit mastered concepts, promoting long-term retention.

gamification.title: Motivating Gamification
gamification.description: Game narratives and unlocked achievements stimulate curiosity and consistency in students.
